formulas.name: ProjectMessageFormPreObs
formulas.expression: If({!Include_Project_Details_for_Pre_Obs} = TRUE, {!Project_Message} & {!NewLine} & {!NewLine} & "• Silo: " & {!SiloMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Planned Start: " & {!PlannedStartMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Planned Finish: " & {!PlannedFinishMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Supplier's Name: " & {!SuppliersNameMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Supplier's Brand or Private Labeled: " & {!SupplierBrandorPrivateMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Last Time Buy: " & {!LastTimeBuyMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Direct Mailer: " & {!DirectMailerMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Direct Replacement: " & {!DirectReplacementMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Product Advisory: " & {!ProductAdvisoryMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Email Notification: " & {!EmailNotificationMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Web Note: " & {!WebNoteMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Suggested Replacement: " & {!SuggestedReplacementMessage} & {!NewLine} & {!formVASRequiredMessage}, {!Project_Message}) & BR() & {!$Label.SalesforceURL} & "/" &{!Get_Project.Id}

formulas.name: ProjectMessageFormPricing
formulas.expression: If({!Include_Project_Details_for_Pricing} = TRUE, {!Project_Message} & {!NewLine} & {!NewLine} & "• Silo Affected: " & {!SilosAffectedMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Price Change Type: " & {!PriceChangeTypeMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Planned Start: " & {!PlannedStartMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Planned Finish: " & {!PlannedFinishMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Product Manager Price Change Due Date: " & {!ProductManagerPriceChangeDueDateMessage} , {!Project_Message}) & BR() & {!$Label.SalesforceURL} & "/" &{!Get_Project.Id}

formulas.name: ProjectMessageFormProductLaunch
formulas.expression: If({!Include_Project_Details_for_Product_Launch} = TRUE, {!Project_Message} & {!NewLine} & {!NewLine} & "• Silo: " & {!SiloMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Planned Start: " & {!PlannedStartMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Planned Finish: " & {!PlannedFinishMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• # of Parts: " & {!NoOfPlartsMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Projected 3rd Year Sales: " & {!Projected3rdYearSalesMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Line Ext?: " & {!formIncludesDropShipItems} & {!NewLine} & "• Supplier's Name: " & {!SuppliersNameMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• New Supplier?: " & {!formNewSupplier} & {!NewLine} & "• Supplier's Brand or Private Labeled: " & {!SupplierBrandorPrivateMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Includes Drop-ship Items: " & {!formIncludesDropShipItems} & {!NewLine} & "• ISO Purchase Order #: " & {!ISOPurchaseOrderNoMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• ISO Delivery Date: " & {!ISODeliveryDateMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Initial Stocking Order $ Amount: " & {!InitialStockingOrderDolAmountMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Manual Required?: " & {!ManualRequiredMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Estimated # of Online Technical Pages: " & {!EstimatedNoofOnlineTechnicalPagesMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Est. # of Photos: " & {!EstNoOfPhotosMessage} & {!NewLine} & "• Product insert, supplement or QSG: " & {!ProductInsertorSupplementorQSGMessge} & {!NewLine} & {!formVASRequiredMessage}, {!Project_Message}) & BR() & {!$Label.SalesforceURL} & "/" &{!Get_Project.Id}
